member.name: IEnumerableView.CreateEnumIDListFromContents
member.summary: Creates an enumerator of ID lists from the contents of the view.
member.param: A PIDL that is relative to the Desktop.
Specifies enumeration flags. See the enumerated type.
When this method returns, contains an interface pointer.
member.returns: Returns a success value if successful, or an error value otherwise.

member.name: IEnumerableView.SetEnumReadyCallback
member.summary: Sets a callback on the view that is notified when the initial view enumeration is complete.
member.returns: Returns a success value if successful, or an error value otherwise.

member.name: IEnumerableView
member.summary: Exposes methods that enumerate the contents of a view and receive notification from callback upon enumeration completion. This interface enables clients of a view to attempt to share the view's list of folder contents.
